stepAnswer: $$1$$ star $$=$$ $$p$$ < $$0.05$$, $$2$$ stars $$=$$ $$p$$ < $$0.01$$, $$3$$ stars $$=$$ $$p$$ < $$0.001;$$ stress and sleep shows strongest evidence
